db:abstract.db:para: The Qt D-Bus module is a Unix-only library that you can use to perform Inter-Process Communication using the D-Bus protocol.

db:article.db:para: The Qt D-Bus module is a Unix-only library that you can use to perform Inter-Process Communication using the D-Bus protocol.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Applications using the Qt D-Bus module can provide services to other, remote applications by exporting objects, as well as use services exported by those applications by placing calls and accessing properties.
The Qt D-Bus module provides an interface that extends the Qt Signals and Slots mechanism, allowing one to connect to a signal emitted remotely as well as to connect a local signal to remote slot.
